content: Give friends and family a taste of the apocalypse when you serve up some zombie cookies. Each batch is custom made to order and comes with a dozen blood, guts, and brain hungry zombies that are meticulously decorated with gruesome details.

Showcase your favorite claymation characters while adding a bit of ambient lighting to the room using the Nightmare Before Christmas lamp. On one side, Jack and Sally stand atop an iconic curly hill while the reverse is a silhouette of the dreaded Oogie Boogie.

Put the finishing touches on your technicolor music festival getup with these brilliant LED arm guards. They can be adjusted to your arm’s width and are powered by lithium-ion batteries so you can light up the party for hours on end.

Insert a bit of color to your wardrobe by treating everyone to the majesty of the cosmos wearing these purple galaxy leggings. Made of spandex and polyester, they provide a superb fit and come imprinted with an amazing depiction of our galaxy.

A 1080p screen won’t be the most eye catching feature when your laptop is decorated using the MacBook rainbow keyboard decal. Apart from protecting the keyboard, they provide a great splash of color for your high tech toy.

Create deliciously blasphemous meals with help from these Genesis oven gloves. Styled to look like the hands of Adam and God at the moment of creation, these cotton oven gloves provide a comfortable fit as you prepare your divine creations in the kitchen.

Become the center of attention at the next Comic-Con with your wise-cracking humor while wearing the Deadpool cosplay morphsuit. Made from athletic grade material for a superb fit, it comes with everything you need to turn yourself into everyone’s favorite anti-hero.

Give your man cave that indistinguishable bar smell you love so much by lighting up one of these scented beer bottle candles. The candles are crafted from high quality wax that has over 45 hours of burn time and comes in a variety of beer bottle containers.

Place the finishing touches on your Dark Knight ensemble by complementing it with this Batman utility belt. If you’re looking for quality and realism, this handmade item comes fully detailed and expertly painted to look just like the real thing.

Transform yourself into one of Batman’s greatest – and definitely craziest – adversaries with this Joker mask. Modeled after the Joker from the Dark Knight films, this handmade fiberglass mask perfectly captures the Joker’s deranged appearance.

The “Level Up” gamer birthday card is the ultimate way to wish your Player #2 another year of life. This novelty card is printed on high quality stock paper and provides a clever way to wish that gamer buddy a happy birthday.

Pop the question like any self respecting Time Lord would by using the Doctor Who TARDIS jewelry box. Made with solid craftsmanship, it is expertly painted to look like a miniature version of the Doctor’s iconic time and space traveling blue TARDIS.

Accent your outfit like any self respecting Coachella attendee would with these gold and silver temporary tattoos. These nontoxic tattoos shimmer in brilliant metallic hues and are waterproof – making them ideal for anything from beach outings to music festivals.

Travel light in the great outdoors without making equipment sacrifices by carrying around the tactical credit card axe. This credit card sized tool is made from durable stainless steel and features both straight and serrated edges for increased versatility.

Experience your favorite retro game in a brand new dimension by wearing the Tetris leggings. Perfect for old school gamers, these gnarly leggings come emblazoned with a colorful design depicting the classic arcade game of falling brick structures.

Add a splash of personality to any room in your home by accenting it using the puffer fish hanging light. With his better days behind him, he’s happy to just hang around and give your room a quirky nautical touch with his balloon-like body.

Keep your ID, cash, and even lady products concealed with style by carrying them around in this LEGO brick purse. Composed entirely out of pastel colored LEGO bricks, this compact clutch is the perfect accessory for any daytime outing.

Relax after a long day of battling Rebel scum by plopping down on the Stormtrooper wooden lawn chair. This handmade furniture features all wood construction and superb artistic detailing to achieve a realistic look making it ideal for any Empire loyalist.

Negotiate the most romantic makeout session of your life by drawing up the terms and conditions with the makeout session contract card. You and your sweetie will be able to hammer out all the details so both of you go in knowing full well what to expect.

Give your rock and mineral collection a dose of brilliant color with the addition of the watermelon tourmaneline gemstone. This exotic and food-like gemstone comes in thinly cut slices that showcase the vivid green and pink hues at the center.

Unleash the Dovahkiin warrior within by donning this Skyrim viking helmet. Based on the classic helmet from the video game, it’s expertly painted to achieve a realistic appearance and made from lightweight materials so you can wear it comfortably.

Turn heads as you show your favorite team some love by wearing a light up sports hat. These custom made hats comes in a variety of color schemes/team styles and feature bright neon trimming that outline the logo so it’s visible to everyone in the room.

Give your game room an eye-catching centerpiece when you decorate it using the Borderlands clap trap replica. It’s skillfully made with the highest level of detail and expertly painted in the classic Hyperion yellow just like in the video game.

Make your next party truly unforgettable as you burst everyone’s eardrums with the giant alien monster sound system. This out of this world sound system stands at seven feet tall and is capable of emitting enough sound for a small concert.

Overload your taste buds with these chocolate cheesecake truffles. Your mouth will be treated to a creamy explosion of flavor unlike you’ve ever experienced from the moment you bite into one of these chocolaty balls.

Begin a promising career in the paranormal by hunting down ghouls using the Ghostbusters ghost trap and pedal. This meticulously detailed prop is ideal for use in live action roleplaying and includes everything you and your team will need when the ghosts arrive.

Have your pets/livestock enjoy the great outdoors without fear of attack from nearby wildlife by keeping them inside the outdoor geodesic dome. Measuring twenty feet in diameter, the dome functions as an ideal aviary or animal pen for small pets and poultry.

Be the envy of every hipster within a five mile radius by listening to your favorite bands through the iPhone vintage speaker horn. This distinguished and battery-free speaker amplifies your iPhone’s sound while adding a hint of old school flair to the room.

Say your prayers and count your blessings with these Golden Girls prayer candles. Your favorite senior citizen gal pals are back dressed in their finest robes and ready to listen to your woes while helping make your prayers come true.

Unleash the hell hounds of Hollywood upon your living room with this Ghostbusters terror dog statue. The fierce demon dogs from the original Ghostbusters flick are recreated with incredible detail and stand at six inches tall making them ideal for the coffee table.

Show your allegiance to the Empire as you accent your look using the Star Wars TIE fighter rings.  Each sterling silver ring is designed after the Empire’s flagship starfighter and comes accented with a beautiful black onyx at the center.

Bring the brilliance of Marvel’s greatest hero into your home with the Iron Man stained glass. This handmade work of art skillfully portrays Iron Man in one of his classic attack poses amid a rich blue background that adds contrast and depth to the piece.

Just when you thought you had seen and eaten it all comes this genius creation – red velvet s’more cookies. This homemade treat places a creative spin on a classic treat by combining the deliciousness of red velvet cake with marshmallows and chocolate. Yum!

Give your kids nightmares that’ll endure throughout their childhood by dressing up in the Oogie Boogie costume. Great for parties or pranks, this custom made full body suit and mask is crafted from burlap to provide an frighteningly authentic look.

Decorate your home with one of the most iconic video game quasi-enemies of all time with the 8-bit duck hunt repurposed painting. Inspired from the NES classic “Duck Hunt”, the painting has been masterfully touched up to include the seemingly immortal duck.

Enjoy a night of free drinks and bad decision making by sporting one of these bachelorette party temporary tattoos. It’s the perfect way to ensure you and your wild group of friends get hit on by every sleazeball in the joint before the night is over.

Take your sexcapades to new heights by stuffing your lover’s mouth with this cheeseburger slider ball gag. The ergonomical design allows it to fit comfortably in your gluttonous slave’s orifice and carries no unpleasant plastic odors.

Relive all your favorite moments from the world’s greatest sitcom by constructing your own Seinfeld apartment. This DIY miniature papercraft shows you everything you’ll need to construct your very own version of Jerry Seinfeld’s iconic NYC apartment.

Reward your taste buds – and punish your anus – by indulging in some spicy sriracha peanuts. These gourmet treats are oven roasted and come bathed in a blend of spices and sriracha that’ll have you hooked after your first mouthful.

Bring one of cartoon’s most iconic vixens to life by dressing up in the Jessica Rabbit costume. This made to order getup expertly employs the use of sequin mesh and velvet to accurately recreate the cartoon vixen’s sultry look. Hourglass figure sold separately.

Give your game room a geeky touch befitting a dungeon master of your caliber with this giant D20 dice. The dice is made of a transparent acrylic material and comes in a variety of cool translucent colors – making this a great addition for game night.

Become the best groom ever by gifting your buddies with a personalized groomsmen football. This custom memento commemorates your special day with beautifully styled lettering on a real leather football, so you can get a nice scrimmage going at the reception.

Sport some incredibly vibrant and beautiful artwork on your body without making a life-long commitment with the watercolor temporary tattoo. These aesthetically pleasing tats come in a variety of lively hues and last for up to seven days with proper care.

Give your outfit some geeky gamer flair by accessorizing it with the Nintendo GameCube purse. This nostalgic and fashionable purse features a vibrant custom paint job and a cloth-lined interior to help protect the contents inside.

Let that special someone know that “I choose you” – by giving them the Pokemon style diamond engagement ring. This exquisite creation boasts a white gold band accented with small diamonds and topped off with a jewel Pokeball.

Make snack time the best part of your day by indulging in the fresh taste of some mint chocolate chip cookies. Apart from their minty kick, each cookie is packed with rich chocolate chips and features a bright green color that make them ideal for the holidays.

Liven up your classroom’s decor by adding a decorative and educational touch to it using these wool solar system planets. Each of our neighboring planets is fashioned entirely out of wool that’s firmly felted yet soft to the touch and depicted in vivid color.

Prepare your meals like any self respecting gamer would by chopping up your ingredients on the NES cartridge cutting board. Made from resilient maple, walnut, cherry, and mahogany, this custom board comes molded in the shape of a classic NES cartridge!

Give your look some geeky flair when you accent your outfit with this fun Pac-Man hand ring. This custom creation displays our favorite circular hero chasing down the delicious looking black onyx gems laid across your fingers.

Ensure Mittens receives a good night’s rest by replacing his frumpy pillow with this ultra comfortable felted cat bed. This luxurious sleeping nook features a practical circular design and comes lined with green felt that’s even softer than his own fluffy coat.

Boot up your favorite games and applications in less than 12 parsecs like a true Star Wars fan when you swap out your generic PC for this one of a kind highly detailed Millennium Falcon toy that has been transformed into a fully functional personal computer.

Prank your friends and family as you trick them into believing you just got some sick tribals with help from the temporary tattoo kit. This easy to use kit features 100% chemical free ink to unleash your imagination and artistic skills and create realistic looking tats.

Treat your eyes to otherworldly colors as you gaze at the iridescence of these bismuth crystals. The crystals feature intricate and unique patterns accented with a plethora of amazing color combinations making them a great accent for the home or office.

It’s dangerous to go alone – which is why you should never leave the house without the Legend of Zelda wooden sword! Each sword come fully colored and styled to give it a geeky pixelated appearance inspired from the original Zelda video game.

Pay homage to one of the greatest horror movie villains of all time with these boldly styled Freddy Krueger high heels. Every one of Freddy’s trademark characteristics are displayed beautifully, from his iconic striped shirt to razor sharp claws.

It’s morphin’ time! Now you can join the elite ranks of these famed heroes by accenting your outfit with the Power Rangers morpher belt buckle. This handmade buckle sports a sturdy frame and comes accented with stickers to create an authentic look.

Please your master race brethren by giving your outfit a geeky touch using these colorful circuit board tattoo tights. Each pair features a unique design that creates the illusion you’ve tattooed complex circuit boards all over your legs.

Bring your favorite Quahog citizen to your hometown by dressing up in the Stewie Griffin costume. The outfit includes his trademark red and yellow jumper getup in addition to a one size fits all mask to give you an abnormally large cranium.

Transform yourself into one of Batman’s most sultry foes when you suit up in this Catwoman costume. Made entirely from vinyl, it’s hand tailored to your body and masterfully recreates Michelle Phieffer’s iconic getup from the Batman Returns movie.

What better way for a gamer to keep his hats and jackets neatly hung than on the Playstation controller coat rack.  Skillfully crafted from birch ply in the likeness of the PS controller, this detailed piece can works as both a rack and functional art.

Create an enchanting environment in any room in your home by accenting it using a recycled wine bottle light. Ideal for creating a romantic mood, each lamp comes crammed with dozens of small twinkle lights that provide a unique glow depending on the bottle color.

Stay warm and fashionable like a true Pokemon master with this Pikachu crocheted beanie. Handmade entirely from yarn, the beanie perfectly captures this electric type Pokemon’s likeness and features two adorable yellow pointy ears that stick out when worn.

Soar the open skies like a care-free birdie when you strap on a pair of these steampunk mechanical wings. Although not actually built for flight, these beautiful wings extend over six feet wide and come accented with yellow LED lights.

Create a surreal nautical setting in your humble abode by illuminating your room using these light up hanging jellyfish. Each set features different sized jellyfish that each come embedded with a white LED at the center that creates a magical effect upon being lit.

Avoid staining your furniture with water rings while giving your humble abode a homey feel to it using these rustic wood drink coasters. Each set is crafted from Bur oak and varnished to highlight the growth rings and blemishes in the wood for a truly unique look.

Give your room a little gamer flair by decorating the plain walls with the Super Mario Bros 8-bit wall art. The famous Koopa-bashing Italian plumbers are back in all their 8-bit glory and come ready to hang – making them an ideal gift for any old school gamer.

Tear your family apart on game night by embarking on the adventure of a lifetime by playing with the replica Jumanji board game. Featuring magnetic pieces and game rules printed onto real wood, this movie quality replica makes an ideal gift for any cinefile.

Create a truly unique ambiance in your home with mesmerizing lighting effects displayed by the fractal table lamp. Handcrafted from coconuts, these novelty lamps comes etched with amazingly intricate patterns designed to project one of a kind designs on the walls.

Give your ensemble a touch of geeky flair when you accent it using the Zelda Majora’s mask watch. This lovely custom watch features a sleek elegant stainless steel band and comes decorated with a detailed and accurate rendition of the famous in-game clock.

Dress up as Starcraft royalty by donning the Queen of Blades costume. This incredibly detailed ensemble is handmade in Italy from latex and plastazote to give your feeble human body a shockingly realistic Zerg-like appearance.

titleEN: Back To The Future Desk Clock
content: Straight out of the vault from Dr. E. Brown Enterprises comes the retro Back To The Future inspired desk clock. Styled just like Doc’s time circuit display, it shows you the exact dates Marty traveled to the past and future in addition to the actual time.

Deliver a delicious double blow to your senses when you bite into a rainbow cookie. This technicolor homemade treat can be customized with a variety of color schemes, making it ideal for all kinds of celebrations or events.

Leave your audience begging for an encore by blowing their minds while wearing these LED suits. These high quality suits feature a centralized computer control that lets you synchronize lighting effects to musical compositions to create stunning visuals.

Transform yourself into Neverland’s most feared villain by slipping into the Captain Hook costume. Modeled after Dustin Hoffman’s iconic character, this handmade ensemble features movie-quality detailing for an incredibly authentic appearance.

Turn your childhood dream of owning a Pokemon into a reality with this life size Pikachu doll. Though he won’t emit any electric sparks from his cheeks, this adorable little handmade doll looks incredibly realistic and can be set to a variety of different poses.

titleEN: Is It Me You’re Looking For Doormat
content: Greet incoming guests with a bit of 80s humor using the “Hello, Is It Me You’re Looking For?” doormat. The design plays on Lionel Richie’s mega-hit to provide a warm and comical welcome to anyone that walks up to your humble abode.

Strike fear in the heart of the enemy when you show up to your live action role playing game dressed in the Warhammer 40K battle suit. The suit features a high level of artistry in the design and is made from lightweight materials ideal for a day on the battlefield.

Make your illustrations come to life by coloring them in using these rainbow pencils. No matter what color you’re in need of to complete your orgy of color masterpiece, you’ll be sure to find it on the multicolored tip of this all-black pencil.

Stash your cash like any respectable old school gamer would with this custom leather NES controller wallet. The wallet depicts the classic Nintendo controller in brilliant detail while the suede lined interior provides plenty of storage space for cash, credit cards, and IDs.

Turn heads by projecting a spectrum of color while wearing the rainbow sparkle dress. Styled to look like a futuristic getup, this tight little dress features a unique platinum sequence that changes to various vibrant colors depending on how the light hits it.

titleEN: Han Solo In Carbonite Chocolate Truffle
content: Sample the sweetest treat in the entire galaxy by raiding Jabba’s pantry and biting into a Han Solo trapped in carbonite chocolate truffle. The iconic image of the intergalactic smuggler is carved into this savory truffle with a delicious Nutella center.

Greet mother nature’s coldest weather with open arms when you have the Dwarven beard beanie at your disposal. Ideal for windy weather, the beanie covers your head from every angle while adorning your body with a lush Middle Earth beard.

Give your kitchen a bit of billionaire flair with the Batman cutting board. Made from walnut, it comes emblazoned with the 8-bit version of the iconic bat symbol and offers ample space for chopping, slicing, mincing, and maybe just a little bit of crime fighting.

Give your land-lover home a nautical touch that draws the eyes in with the bronze octopus coffee table. This beautiful bronze cephalopod sprawls over the floor, creating the illusion it’s on the move while three of its tentacles hold up the glass top.

Proudly display what a battle-hardened survivor you are by flaunting your zombie slaying prowess with this zombie ears necklace. Each ear is individually sculpted from polymer clay to look like rotting zombie flesh – making it ideal for any post-apocalyptic getup.

Transport your thirst-quenching alcoholic beverages with ease as you pedal to your next destination equipped with the bicycle six pack carrier. It will securely latch onto your bike to provide a cool and convenient way to transport your booze.

Propose to your loved one for better or worse, in sickness and health, through space and time with the Doctor Who spinning TARDIS engagement ring birch wood box – til the end of regeneration cycles do you part.

Quit your day job and follow your dreams earning a living as a street performer by purchasing the mirror suit. Crafted out of dozens of scalene triangles, this handmade garment gives the impression that you’re covered from head to toe in broken glass.

Slice through virtually any obstacle you encounter like it was warm butter when wielding the one handed Damascus axe. This gorgeous yet deadly weapon is skillfully forged by a master smith in a full tang style that features two different sized blades on each side.

Give your sweetheart a token of your everlasting love with these steel metal rose flowers. Each rose is masterfully crafted from a blend of steel and recycled materials to achieve an incredibly realistic appearance right down to the smallest detail.

Celebrate the unexpected star of the halftime show by satisfying your sweet tooth with a batch of Superbowl Left Shark cookies. Now, you’ll be able to make an entire army of uncoordinated sharks the whole family can sink their jaws into.

Give some personality to your humble abode by anthropomorphizing your walls with these electrical outlet stickers. These novelty decals add some color and life as they transform your plain outlets into some of your favorite television personalities.

Add a splash of color to your look by displaying the majesty of our vast universe all over your legs and booty by wearing these galaxy leggings. These space-themed leggings come in all sizes and work great for any time of the year.

Stay prepared for any alien threat that comes your way like a true intergalactic smuggler by using the Han Solo Blaster prop replica. Crafted by a skilled fan, it features the intricate level of detailing you’d expect in addition to quick trigger response in case you have to shoot first.

Indulge your sweet tooth with the ultimate surgary treat by chomping down on these red velvet white chocolate cookies. These incredible tasty creations beautifully combines the delicious red velvet cake with rich white chocolate to produce a treat that’s to die for.

Commemorate your special day like a true millennial by using the personalized YouTube photo prop. If it’s internet fame you seek, this novelty prop will help you get the ball rolling by going from snap to upload with one click.

Make yourself look cocked, locked, and loaded with the bullet belt buckle. This one of a kind beauty comes adorned with over 30 spent rounds of various calibers and is accented with dozens of Swarovski crystals to give it a little extra shimmer.

Give your smartphone an aesthetic befitting the tortured artist image you want to project by protecting it with the watercolor set iPhone case. This durable plastic case’s unique and vibrant design is ideal for splashing a bit of color into your daily life.

Give your party the hype it deserves by spreading the word around town using these Willy Wonka “Golden Ticket” invitations. Each ticket is a perfect replica of the iconic ones used in the classic film and can be customized for a variety of events.

Treat your eyes and mouth to a sensory overload by having a slice of the rainbow cheesecake. The visually stimulating rainbow design draws you in while the creamy cheese and buttery graham crust ensure you’ll remain seated until the entire cake is devoured.
